snippet: California has enacted legislation to bar tobacco marketers from giving out samples of cigarettes and smokeless tobacco to people in public places beginning next year.    The bill, which Gov. Pete Wilson signed on Saturday, was supported by anti-s...
lead_paragraph: California has enacted legislation to bar tobacco marketers from giving out samples of cigarettes and smokeless tobacco to people in public places beginning next year. The bill, which Gov. Pete Wilson signed on Saturday, was supported by anti-smoking lobbyists and other health organizations who contend that when cigarettes are given away, minors can obtain them.
